TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WebPartHelpMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定用來顯示 控制項說明內容的可用使用者介面 (UI) 型別。

span.span: Specifies the available types of user interfaces (UIs) for displaying Help content for a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 屬性用來決定瀏覽器顯示控制項的說明內容的方式。The property is used to determine how a browser will display Help content for a control. 列舉包含值，可以套用至屬性。The enumeration contains values that can be applied to the property. 預設值為屬性是強制回應。The default value for the property is Modal. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示相同的瀏覽器視窗中控制項的說明。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to display Help for a control in the same browser window. 此範例中的第一個部分會假設使用的自訂控制， `TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀。The first part of this example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 程式碼範例也包含 HTML 網頁，其中包含虛構的說明內容`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。The code example also includes an HTML page that contains fictitious Help content for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 要讓範例能夠運作，您必須將下列程式碼儲存在名為 Textwebparthelp.htm 檔案，並將它放在您的站台的.aspx 網頁與相同的目錄。For this example to work, you must save the following code in a file named Textwebparthelp.htm and place it in the same directory of your site as the .aspx page. ``` Text Content WebPart Help

Text Content WebPart Help

To make the WebPart control work...
``` 此範例的最後一個部分會示範如何建立參考的網頁`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。The final part of the example is a Web page that shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 請注意，在宣告式標記屬性值設定為巡覽，以及此程式碼也會設定的值屬性的 HTML 檔案，其中包含說明內容的名稱。Note that in the declarative markup, the property value is set to Navigate, and the code also sets the value of the property to the name of the HTML file that contains the Help content. 載入網頁瀏覽器，並按 [說明] 動作的動詞命令功能表上控制項。Load the page into a browser, and click the help verb on the verbs menu of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_HelpMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_HelpMode/CS/helpmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_HelpMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_HelpMode/VB/helpmodevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode Modal = int32(0)

summary.span: 如果瀏覽器有此功能，要另外開啟瀏覽器視窗。

span.span: Opens a separate browser window, if the browser has this capability.

summary.span: 使用者必須先關閉視窗，才能回到 Web 組件頁面。

span.span: A user must close the window before returning to the Web Parts page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode Modeless = int32(1)

summary.span: 如果瀏覽器有此功能，要另外開啟瀏覽器視窗。

span.span: Opens a separate browser window, if the browser has this capability.

summary.span: 使用者不需要關閉視窗，就能返回 Web 網頁。

span.span: A user does not have to close the window before returning to the Web page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode Navigate = int32(2)

summary.span: 取代瀏覽器視窗中的 Web 組件頁面。

span.span: Replaces the Web Parts page in the browser window.
